Class ImmutableExecutionContext

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
@Generated(value={"Immutables.generator","ExecutionContext"})
@Immutable
public final class ImmutableExecutionContext
extends ExecutionContext
    Immutable implementation of ExecutionContext.

    Use static factory method to create immutable instances: ImmutableExecutionContext.of().
